name: Essential Performance
author: Vova Zubko

sections.description:
This plugin was born with ideas to combine all the achievements that for many years he created for many projects.

This plan combines best practices to speed up the loading of both individual pages and the entire system.

With this plugin you will receive more loyalty from visitors to your site, a higher rating from search
engines and as a result even more visitors.

Features

  • Lazy Load – is a smart technique which reduces the page load time.
  • Leverage Browser Caching – To leverage your browser’s caching generally means that you can specify how long web browsers should keep images, CSS and JS stored locally.
  • Code Injection – a simple way to add html/stylesheet/javascript code to head and/or footer
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/essential-performance directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatible with WooCommerce?

Yes, it is compatible with WooCommerce 100%.
sections.changelog:
0.0.4

New option added to insert code to Head/footer.
Minor fixes.

0.0.3

Added switch for Lazy Load.
Minor fixes.

0.0.2

  • Added Leverage browser caching for static files

0.0.1

  • Initial plugin
